document.full_text: libyan officials and the international committee of the red cross have had positive talks on expanding the icrc's humanitarian activities in the country, including visiting rebels captured in the conflict, it said.
document.title: red cross holds talks on wider libya aid role
lines_and_colors: libyan officials and the international committee of the red cross have had positive talks on expanding the icrc's humanitarian activities in the country, including visiting rebels captured in the conflict, it said.
